function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of flexible approach in implementing measures for different building typologies and purposes","Impact":"Ineffective containment of contagious diseases in buildings based on typology and purpose","Mitigation":"Conducting extensive research to tailor solutions for specific building typologies and purposes","Technologies":"Adaptable building design and ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in buildings","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Need for more research in developing effective win-win solutions for resilience and sustainability","Impact":"Limited progress in creating designs that effectively address both resilience and sustainability in the context of contagious disease containment","Mitigation":"Investing in further research and development of innovative design solutions","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, energy-efficient systems, and waste management technologies","People":"Architects, engineers, and sustainability experts","Owner":"Research institutions and government organizations"}]}
